column11: 2015 funeral service for alyce m. johnson
column14: mn will be 10:30 a. m. saturday
column16: at grace lutheran church in fairmont. visitation will be from 9:30 10:30 a. m. saturday
column18: at grace lutheran church. burial will be in grandview memorial gardens in rochester. alyce passed away wednesday evening
column20: 2015 at the lakeview methodist healthcare center in fairmont. the lakeview funeral home of fairmont is handling the arrangements for the family. alyce marie (horsman) johnson was born on september 8
column22: the daughter of thomas and roberta horsman. her family moved to spring valley
column23: mn where alyce attended school. she graduated from spring valley high school in 1949. after her schooling she worked at the first national bank in rochester. on december 29
column25: she was united in marriage to harlan s. johnson in rochester. they lived in rochester before moving to owatonna
column26: austin and then to fairmont in 1959. they lived on south silver lake for many years before moving into fairmont in 2014. alyce enjoyed taking care of her pets
column27: reading and going out to dine with harlan. she is survived by her husband
column28: harlan s. johnson of fairmont; brother-in-law and sisters-in-law
column30: audrey johnson; many special nieces and nephews
column31: great nieces and nephews; other relatives and friends. alyce was preceded in death by her parents and parents-in-law; brother-in-law
